subject: Re: OT: Duplicate messages
body:
I did receive three duplicates from Tom Phoenix's reply to a thread I
posted earlier this evening.

BTW, thanks a lot Tom, I appreciate the educational insight. :-)

- sf

jbuburuz@sce.carleton.ca wrote:
> I am not getting duplicates.
> 
> jerry
> 
>> nope.
>>

>>> From: Tom Yarrish 
>>> Sent: May 10, 2007 5:27 PM
>>> To: beginners@perl.org
>>> Subject: OT: Duplicate messages
>>>
> Hey all,

> the list?  I've received either two or three copies of the same
> message a lot today (just today though).
> 
> Thanks,
> Tom
>>>
